extendedInfo.description: A new android-based messenger has been released. With new android icons and funny emotion icons, you can enjoy chatting with friends or new friends. Simple to use and can send offline messages by push notifications. Register an account and go for a chat instantly like other IM apps: Facebook chat, ICQ, Windows Live Messenger, etc.Yo! Why bother to try when it's free, Check it Out now!Supported Features:- Use your 3G or WiFi to message with people, not as a SMS or text message. Free to chat with your friends anywhere.- Free messenger with NO Ads. at all.- No need to access your address book and private contact list. Simply register an account to chat.- Use android emotion icons or other smileys to chat with your friends.- Notify you of new messages by push notifications.- Send offline messages easily. Chat it Out will save your offline messages and your friends will receive them when they go online.- Add your friends to favorite list, find you best friends at an instant.- Set your avatar and nickname to show to other users.- Support multiple languages include English, tradition Chinese and simplified Chinese.We are improving our features according to usersâ feedback, free feel to give us comments or rate high and spread Chat it Out to support us. Thanks.Facebook fans page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Chat-it-Out/142765275861416If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at:chatitout.creative@gmail.com

reviews.title: FACT FACEBOOK IS TOO BOSAY.
reviews.comment: Fun is #1,Facebook\'s not fun.WHERE\'S A CHAT TOO? WHEN?WHO IS BOSS OF FACEBOOK RULES?All us people want fun. Not stupid Facebook RULES.
reviews.author: Dorothy Sue Stanley

reviews.comment: Bad app. Definitely needs improvement. Always says registration failed, no instruction whatsoever.
